thread.title: Sutton v Arsenal: Mesut Ozil basically confirms he's out of FA Cup clash on Snapchat | Metro News
thread.title_full: Sutton v Arsenal: Mesut Ozil basically confirms he's out of FA Cup clash on Snapchat | Metro News

author: Tom Olver For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Sutton v Arsenal: Mesut Ozil basically confirms he's out of FA Cup clash on Snapchat | Metro News
text:
Tom Olver for Metro.co.uk Monday 20 Feb 2017 3:39 pm Arsenal star Mesut Ozil is expected to be rested (Picture: Snapchat) 
Arsenal ace Mesut Ozil appears to have confirmed that he will not take part in the side’s FA Cup clash with Sutton on Monday night. Theo Walcott left red-faced as Arsenal fans slam club for 'disrespectful' gesture 
The German playmaker faced widespread criticism after his underwhelming display for the Gunners in their 5-1 thumping at the hands of Bayern Munich in the Champions League. 
On Sunday, Ozil’s team-mates were pictured in training ahead of Arsenal’s trip to Gander Green Lane but the 28-year-old was nowhere to be seen. 
And, in the lead-up to the cup match, Ozil uploaded a photograph to his Snapchat page of himself on a plane amid reports he’s set to be rested. Mesut Ozil was panned for his performance in Munich (Picture: Getty) 
The World Cup winner is yet to make an appearance for Arsenal in any of the previous round of the tournament and it’s expected Arsene Wenger will leave him out of the squad once again.
